linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yuya Sakaki. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm him as efficiently as possible.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate.
You will see Yuya 's unlock missions upon reaching Stage 9 or above in Duel World (DM)
Unlocking Yuya will also unlock Duel World (ARC-V)
Summon 1 Level (Rank) 7 or higher Dragon-Type monster(s).

card.name: Assault Blackwing - Onimaru the Divine Thunder

skill.name: Set! Delta Accel!
skill.description:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "T.G. Halberd Cannon," "T.G. Blade Blaster," "T.G. Power Gladiator," "T.G. Wonder Magician," and "T.G. Recipro Dragonfly" to your Extra Deck. 
In addition, the following effect can be used once the turn you have Synchro Summoned 2 or more "T.G." Synchro Monsters. Return 1 "T.G." card in your hand to your Deck and play 1 "T.G. Recipro Dragonfly" from your Extra Deck.

skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
